member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.FindCircularReference(WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.Constraints)
member.summary: Finds circular references in the constraints.
member.remarks: This is not particularly performant, but it works.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.FindCircularReference(WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.Constraints,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String@)
member.summary: Recursive function that finds circular references in the constraints.
member.param: The identifier currently being looking for. (Fixed across a given run.)
A list of identifiers seen, to ensure each identifier is only expanded once.
If a circular reference is found, will contain the chain of references.
member.returns: True if a circular reference is found, false otherwise.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.FlattenDependentReferences(WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.Constraints)
member.summary: Flattens any dependency chains to simplify reordering.

member.summary: Adds dependent references to a list.

member.name: T:WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.TopologicalSort
member.summary: Reorder by topological sort
member.remarks: We use a variation of Kahn (1962) algorithm as described in Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Topological_sorting), with the additional criteria that start nodes are sorted lexicographically at each step to ensure a deterministic ordering based on 'after' dependencies and ID.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.TopologicalSort.Sort(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.Constraints)
member.summary: Reorder by topological sort
member.returns: The topologically sorted list of IDs.

member.summary: Copies a Constraints set (to prevent modifying the incoming data).

member.summary: Finds initial start IDs. (Those with no constraints.)

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.Burn.Bundles.OrderSearchesCommand.TopologicalSort.SortStartIds
member.summary: Sorts start IDs.

member.summary: Removes the resolved constraint and updates the list of startIds with any now-valid (all constraints resolved) IDs.
member.param: The ID to resolve from the set of constraints.

member.name: T:WixToolset.Core.Burn.RowIndexedList`1
member.summary: A list of rows indexed by their primary key. Unlike a RowDictionary this indexed list will track rows in their added order and will allow rows with duplicate keys to be added to the list, although only the first row will be indexed.

member.summary: Creates an empty .

member.summary: Creates and populates a with the rows from the given .
member.remarks: Rows added to the index are not automatically added to the given .

member.summary: Gets the duplicates in the list.

member.summary: Gets the row by integer key.
member.returns: Row or null if key is not found.

member.summary: Gets the row by string key.
member.returns: Row or null if key is not found.

member.returns: True if key was found otherwise false.

member.summary: Tries to add a row as long as it would not create a duplicate.
member.returns: True if the row as added otherwise false.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.Burn.RowIndexedList`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds a row to the list. If a row with the same key is already index, the row is is not in the index but will still be part of the list and added to the duplicates list.

member.returns: Index of row or -1 if not found.

member.summary: Inserts a row at a particular index of the list.

member.summary: Gets or sets a row at the specified index.

member.summary: Empties the list and it's index.

member.summary: Copies the rows of the list to an array.

member.summary: Number of rows in the list.
